ca.thurn.jgail.core

Interface Agent

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    AsynchronousAgent
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    C4HumanAgent, IngeniousHumanAgent, MonteCarloSearch, NegamaxSearch, TicTacToeHumanAgent, UctSearch

    public interface Agent
    An Agent is any entity capable of analyzing a given game state and selecting an action.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      State getStateRepresentation() 
      ActionScore pickActionBlocking(int player, State rootNode)
      Picks an action for the provided player to take from the provided root node.

    • Method Detail

      • pickActionBlocking

        ActionScore pickActionBlocking(int player,
                             State rootNode)
        Picks an action for the provided player to take from the provided root node. Blocks the calling thread until a result is available.
        Parameters:
        player - The player who this Agent is trying to optimize for.
        rootNode - The current state of the game, using the state representation this agent returned from getStateRepresentation().
        Returns:
        An ActionScore pair consisting of the action this player should take in the current game state and an optional corresponding heuristic score for this action, where a higher number indicates a better action for the player.

      • getStateRepresentation

        State getStateRepresentation()
        Returns:
        A copy of the null-initialized state object this agent wishes to use for its internal state representation.
